name: Sync new Google Sheets rows to Ninox for record management
description: Streamline your data management process by automatically syncing updates from Google Sheets to Ninox. With this template, every time a new row is added or an existing row is modified in your Google Sheets, Make will create or update the corresponding records in Ninox. This ensures that your database is always up-to-date, allowing for more efficient project management and collaboration. Make sure your Google Sheets has the necessary columns set up to match the fields in Ninox for seamless integration.
